Name: The Fog
About the game: One day, a thick fog descends on the village, making all inhabitants disappear; All but one. In this atmospheric platformer, you must collect mystical glowing lanterns to survive the fog. Meet and help the few survivors from the five areas. Throughout your journey, you must face many beastly dark glowing monsters. Some are slow and demonic, while others are aggressive and working for your death. During your journey, you may even acquire various new abilities. Features include: Atmospheric World Building Mysterious Plot Varied Platforming An Array of Unique Enemies Challenging Exciting Bosses Intresting Characters Deep Lore
